Articles.Content:
So i'm back with yet another problem with the forums. well, two problems. First one: When i edit a post, and hit save, nothing happens. I hit advanced, and nothing happens. I cannot edit posts, which is a problem for me, as a rocket comapany CEO.

Second problem, i cannot "reply with quote" i click it and a little loading circle comes up and it does nothing after that. It just loads and loads and loads.

Both of these issues are greatly affecting me. While im sure its something on my end, i would really like some help with this.

Endersmens, I had that editing problem in IE, but I don't experience it in Chrome. If you do want to stay with IE, just refresh the page (F5) and you'll be able to edit again.

Haven't run into your second issue, myself.

iI experience the first problem on IE and firefox. And refreshing the page doesn't work. ( i think. Ill try it on this post) I need to stay with IE because chrome and Firefox have both been infected with invisible ads. I am working on getting rid of them but have no idea how.
Eeyup. Refreshing doesn't work. Also, all of the buttons are broken. Save, Advanced, Delete, and Cancel all do nothing. Help.
Have you tried doing a browser cache clear and a reboot? Thats what I do when this crops up.
how do i do that on IE?

If that doesn't work, try running Internet Explorer without any add-ons and see if it works then. Also, if your security settings are such that they block javascript, that could explain a thing or two.

Crap! That might be it. For some reason the slider for "security" was set to medium high instead of default, which is medium. It blocked every link and popup. I'll go test it out now that I changed that. I'll try to edit this post.
Ok its still not working. Could you give me the settings of IE that might affect this? Im at a loss here. thankfully i can still edit on my phone, but it takes wayyyy longer

I don't mean to be rude, but could i please get some help? I'm desperate. This is so frustrating not being able to do anything unless i get on my phone, which is slow and tedious. any help is much appreciated.
